Headline: #92 Foster Temporary Westbound Reroute near Foster/Cicero
ShortDescription: Westbound 92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Cicero, Elston and Foster due to, street blockage near Foster/Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Cicero, Elston and Foster due to, street blockage near Foster/Cicero.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #82 Kimball/Homan Temporary Reroute at Kimball/Belden
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball/Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Kimball/Belden.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball/Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Kimball, Armitage, Kedzie, Fullerton and resume normal route on Kimball, due to street blockage near Kimball/Belden.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Logan Square. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problem at Logan Square.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
